Name: Planet Bash
About the game: Your name is Moonbert and you are the moon of this blue planet, you hate these little polluting guys living there and for some reason they seem to hate you too. This is a game where you bash the crap out of the planet and its people! Don't worry, they had it coming. Features: Non-stop fast action Full Controller support Original hard rock soundtrack High levels of orbital destruction 5 types of enemies seeking to destroy you Powerups to help you in the fight of planetary destruction Fashionable lunar hats to give you special bonuses and powerups Community Discord Have any questions, comments, or concerns? Our Community Discord is the best place to keep up to date on all the news and to suggest things you would like to see added to Planet Bash!
